A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This did not have the spirit of a Space Epic not a “Star Wars” movie. Minor spoilers: No cool new aliens (everyone who matters is a human or a droid or dies)\, no “Space” (bombs “drop” even without gravity; If you run out of fuel in space you slow down; every ship has the same speed except the Millennium Falcon... )\, the big bad villain was just “there;” it wasn’t really a war (when you see the numbers remaining\, it’s like a skirmish / OJ Simpson car chase). If you like seeing people “wake up” then this movie is for you\, as just about everyone gets knocked out and wakes up before a pivotal moment: Drama! Sigh. I guess Star Wars really is over.
